ICK NAMGUNG

About ICK

Hi, my name is Ick Namgung and I am majoring in Computer Science at the University of Texas at Austin. I’m insanely passionate about teaching my knowledge of computer science as much as possible to those who are eager to learn. Also, I am interested to explore how the technology harmonizes with fashion. I want to have some real-life experience related to my major outside the classroom and discover the unique contributions I could make. I am attaching my resume and thank you in advance for your consideration.

Life

College Life

I accepted CAP program, so I started the first year of the college life at the University of Texas at San Antonio. I couldn't wait to get in the University of Texas at Austin.

August 2013 - Present

University of Texas at Austin

I didn't get into Computer Science as I transferred to the University of Texas at Austin. Thus, I had to wait another year to be a member of UTCS. FOREVER UTCS!!!!

August 2014 - Present

Europe Sensation

I was on a trip to explore Europe with my older brother. Traveling many countries, I broadened my view of the world. I faced many ethnicities, environments, people with various backgrounds. I really appreciated the change that I had to travel around and I really want to go back and feel it again. I went to Interlaken, Switzerland, italy, France, London, Great Britain, and Rome, Italy

July 2015 - August 2015

Enjoyment -> hardship

During summer 2016, I was able to take upper division courses. The first course was CS429 with Prof. Ghieth(I didn't know until this time that Upper division courses are like lower division courses. I thought I could enjoy this course like cs 312 or CS314...And that was my dilusion).

May 2016 - August 2016

Lambda Alpha Nu(a.k.a. ΛAN)

It was a great opportunity for me to meet many people and to seek a community within the department of Computer Science,

August 2016 - Current
